sequence:
Red Spider Lily's Love

<size=45>Chapter 7 - My Soulmate</size>
"I wanted to save the people I care about."
"It was for the sake of those I couldn't save, and to go beyond the barrier of my memories."
"And to do that, I would do anything, even if it meant asking God for help..."
"But now, that is all in the past... Because now, I've found my soulmate; I've found the person I was destined to be with."

scripts.say: I felt a kiss on my cheek, then woke up. Apparently, I had fallen asleep in Akagi's lap.
Commander, did you sleep well? Dear me, for you to fall asleep like that... You must have been feeling very worn out lately...
I didn't do anything while you were asleep. As long as you accept me, I am happy...
If you say you don't wish to look at me, then that is fine... If you say you won't be mine... then that, too, is fine.
All I'm asking is that you never, ever forget my love for you, Commander...
... You really are an incredibly kind person, Commander...
Then, I could hear people calling out for me.

options.content: Tell Akagi it's time to get going

scripts.say: Of course. We should start heading out.
Please look after me, the fleet, and the whole Sakura Empire.
I pray God may watch over you, Commander... the one... I was fated to be with...
